about_the_game:
"Safety Corp." is a VR action game with realistic weapon mechanics, physics, and puzzle elements. You, as a technician, find yourself in the heart of an uprising at the Safety Corp. factory where crash-test dummies gained consciousness after a software update. In a world full of intricate puzzles and technical challenges, your goal is not only to restore order but also understand this unforeseen rebellion. Can you aid the dummies in their fight for freedom, or will you revert things back to normal? The choice is yours in this immersive VR journey. Brace yourself for the uprising - in Safety Corp., nothing will ever be the same again.

  • Original campaign with compelling characters and a protagonist that will keep you engaged
  • The end-game includes multiplayer PvP and PvE arenas, (Rough-like + Dungeon Generation) and an additional game mode: Infinite Arena.
  • Realistic handling of various weapons, where installed accessories have an impact on the weapon's behavior and recoil depends on factors like single or two-handed operation, mass, installed grips, and tuning
  • Weapon mechanics and physics are tested and approved by practical shooters and tactical instructors, making them realistic and accurate
  • Endless possibilities for tuning with a variety of skins and accessories
  • Built-in level editor with "programmable" props and a community sharing feature, which allows users to create their own game modes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, Radeon R9 290 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: SSD Or Cache-Assisted HDD REQUIRED, Windows Virtual Memory MUST be enabled (16gb recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i7, AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080, Radeon RX 570 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internal SSD HIGHLY Recommended, Windows Virtual Memory MUST be enabled (16gb recommended)
